Side Effects: First month: painful (non-period) abdominal cramping for most of the first month. Unusually long and heavy period. Increased fatigue and brain fog for most of this time as well.
Comments: The first month of being on Kurvelo was probably the worst I've ever experienced in starting new birth control. I almost quit_ especially with the fatigue during and following that horrendous period. But I stuck through it and I've evened out to a much more normal state since then. The start is rocky but can be worth it for women looking for more regular periods and a good contraceptive.
